definition: person from the same village, town, or province
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
Datong or Tatung township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
Datong or Tatung township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
fellow countryman (from the same village)/the folks back home

sentences.english: Feng cares less about himself than the young people of his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 比起同鄉的年輕人，峯更少關心他自己。

sentences.english: You must be thinking about your childhood.
sentences.chinese: 歸鄉的路上你深思不語，同鄉說你一定是想起童年了。

sentences.english: Guess what kind of year TAA -STL would invite us to produce together?
sentences.chinese: 你猜同鄉會要邀請大家一起營造出什麼樣的一年？

sentences.english: He inquired for his little country woman of Mrs. Glass, but without requesting to see her.
sentences.chinese: 他向格拉斯太太問起他的小同鄉，但沒有要求會晤她。

sentences.english: Mr. Li Tieying, new President of Toy Shan Association, extended his holiday greetings to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 台山同鄉會新任會長李鐵英向來賓致以新春問候。

sentences.english: The association was formed in 1975 as a non-profit organization.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣同鄉會創始於一九七五年，爲非營利機構。

sentences.english: What kind of new year do you wish that TAA -STL bring to us?
sentences.chinese: 你希望臺灣同鄉會帶給大傢什麼樣的一年？

sentences.english: I hereby to certify that the above applicant is Teochew's Wife.
sentences.chinese: 謹此證明上述申請人爲潮籍同鄉之妻子。

sentences.english: What a coincidence that the first person I dance with in this school is my town fellow.
sentences.chinese: 真是太巧了，我在這裏的第一個舞伴居然是我的同鄉。

sentences.english: The young Nepali shares a room with nine of his countrymen.
sentences.chinese: 這名年輕的尼泊爾人與九名同鄉分享一個房間。

sentences.english: Another saying is that his town fellow, Du Ping buried him after his death.
sentences.chinese: 又說，鍾馗死後，他的同鄉好友杜平爲他安葬。

sentences.english: The reason why I make friend with you is you are my hometown girl.
sentences.chinese: 想跟你交朋友的原因是你是我的同鄉。

sentences.english: Migrants from all over the country formed plenty of countryman organizations on the geographic basis.
sentences.chinese: 各地移民以地緣爲紐帶組織了大量的同鄉組織。

sentences.english: Association is a concept change, and a relationship is a lie.
sentences.chinese: 同鄉是變化的一種概念，而且是騙人的一種關係。

sentences.english: It can be compared with classmates and comrades-in-arms is the fellow townsman .
sentences.chinese: 可以與同學和戰友相提並論的是同鄉。

sentences.english: Abroad, who is a fellow with the country.
sentences.chinese: 出國，同國之人就是同鄉。

definition: fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
YMCA (international Christian youth movement, formed in 1844)
president of a club, committee etc
short name for Fujian province 福建[Fu2 jian4]/also pr. [Min2]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
overseas Chinese/(in a restricted sense) Chinese emigrant who still retains Chinese nationality/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
